## Orientation enum

Defines potential orientation for back face culling

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum Orientation 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  CCW | <code>1</code> | Counter clockwise |
|  CW | <code>0</code> | Clockwise |
